subsc: Agricultural extension and research,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Agricultural Research Project
            aims at increasing efficiency and productivity of crops and
            livestock production systems with sustainable use of natural
            resources, focusing on the needs of the smallholder sector.
            The project consists of three components.  First,
            strengthening agricultural research system will bring about
            more effective and efficient agricultural research
            institutions, and an effective arrangement for donor
            coordination and for coordinating regional and other
            collaborative research programs.  Second, organization and
            management of agricultural research will provide
            demand-driven, client oriented research, efforts to
            introduce participatory techniques, and guidelines for
            small-farmer oriented and gender-sensitive research.  Third,
            human resource development will support increased number of
            research personnel in needed disciplines, and strengthen
            financial management and information services.
